title: Keep dcing in rank game holy fk..
body: Just got some random dcs in game and other players who live in vancouver has the same problems wtf? I just lost two diamond2 games cuz of that?plz riot at least stop rank games holy fk

replies.body: I'm not seeing any issues with our servers currently.  Are you and these other players you're referring to potentially on the same ISP?  Is this still an issue?
same thing happening to me. i cant keep dcing at champion select
